title: Guanidine functionalized porous SiO2 as heterogeneous catalysts for microwave depolymerization of PET and PLA
content:
RSC Sustain., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3SU00425B, Paper
Open Access

Éadaoin Casey, Rachel Breen, Gerard Pareras, Albert Rimola, Justin D. Holmes, Gillian Collins
Chemical recycling is an important strategy to tackle the growing global problem of plastic waste pollution. Covalent attachment of oganocatalysts to porous SiO2 creates metal free heterogeneous catalysts for open and closed loop recycling of PET and PLA.
